caption.title: Observed and modelled spatial distributions of common ash and its pathogen.
caption.p: Observed distribution of ( a) common ash (1950–2008) and ( b) H. fraxineus (1992–2009) and modelled spatial distribution (as probability of occurrence) of ( c,e) common ash and ( d, f) H. fraxineus calculated from ( c, d) MaxEnt and ( e, f) NPPEN. Maps were produced using ArcGIS software v.10 (Environmental Systems Research Institute, Redlands, California, USA; http://www.esri.com/).
